prompts: Create a small bipedal fire-type Pokemon with a playful nature and a flame on its tail.
I want a starter Pokemon that looks cute and has orange skin and big blue eyes.
Generate a bipedal creature that evolves from a fiery lizard with a warm personality.
Make me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a bright flame for a tail.
Imagine a small orange Pokemon with a charming smile that can shoot fire.
Design a Pokemon with a scaly body and a fiery tail, perfect for a starter trainer.
Show me a playful creature with a light orange color and a determined expression.
